verses.verse: He <S%H7200>showed<s%> me <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7854>Satan<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> at his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> to be his <S%H7853>adversary.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7854>Satan,<s%> <S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> <S%H7854>you,<s%> Satan! <S%H3068>Yes,<s%> Yahweh who has <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> <S%H181>you!<s%> Isn't this a burning stick <S%H5337>plucked<s%> out of the <S%H784>fire?<s%>"
Now <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6674>filthy<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4397>angel.<s%>

He <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> to those who <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "Take the <S%H6674>filthy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> <S%H5493>off<s%> of <S%H559>him.<s%>" To him he said, <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have caused your <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> from <S%H3847>you,<s%> and I will clothe you with rich <S%H4254>clothing.<s%>"

I <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let them <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6797>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head.<s%>" So they <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H6797>turban<s%> on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H3847>clothed<s%> <S%H899>him;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was standing <S%H5975>by.<s%>

"Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'If you will walk in my <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and if you will <S%H8104>follow<s%> my <S%H4931>instructions,<s%> then you also shall <S%H1777>judge<s%> my <S%H1004>house,<s%> and shall also <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2691>courts,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you a place of <S%H4108>access<s%> among these who stand <S%H5975>by.<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H3091>now,<s%> Joshua the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> you and your <S%H7453>fellows<s%> who <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H582>you;<s%> for they are men who are a <S%H4159>sign:<s%> <S%H935>for,<s%> behold, I will bring forth my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> the <S%H6780>Branch.<s%>

<S%H68>For,<s%> behold, the stone that I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> are <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> <S%H6605>behold,<s%> I will engrave its <S%H6603>engraving,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H4185><s%> 'and I will remove the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of that <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H7121><s%> 'you will invite every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> under the <S%H1612>vine<s%> and under the fig <S%H8384>tree.<s%>'"
